competency: Use sales-related information for planning and implementing sales activities

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: List the steps involved in using sales-related information for planning.
Explain how sales information impacts decision-making in planning sales activities.
Create a sales plan using sales-related information for a hypothetical product.
Evaluate the effectiveness of a sales plan based on provided sales data.
Assess the outcomes of a sales activity against planning objectives.
Design a comprehensive sales planning process based on current sales data.

competency: Store information on the sales technology systems, checking its quality, validity and reliability

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Identify the key elements necessary to ensure data quality in sales systems.
Describe the implications of storing unreliable data in sales technology systems.
Implement a data validation process in a sales technology system.
Break down the factors that contribute to data reliability in sales systems.
Appraise the quality of information stored in a given sales technology case.
Develop a framework for assessing the quality and validity of data in sales systems.

competency: Maintain the sales-related information stored in the technology systems, ensuring it is accurate and up to date

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Recall the standards for maintaining accurate sales information.
Clarify the process for updating information in sales technology systems.
Demonstrate updating and maintaining sales information in a provided technology system scenario.
Examine discrepancies in sales records and identify maintenance needs.
Judge the effectiveness of the current procedures for maintaining sales-related information.
Formulate a guideline document for maintaining accurate sales information.

competency: Use tools and technology systems for automation of sales-related tasks and activities

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: List different tools available for automating sales tasks.
Explain the advantages of automation in sales-related activities.
Utilize an automation tool to perform a sales-related task.
Compare automated processes versus manual processes in sales activities.
Assess the impact of automation on sales team productivity.
Design an automated workflow for a specific sales task.

competency: Share sales-related information for collaboration with members of the sales team

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Enumerate methods for sharing sales information with team members.
Discuss the importance of collaboration in sales activities.
Collaborate with a team by sharing feedback on sales prospects using a shared platform.
Identify barriers to effective information sharing in a sales team.
Critique a case study on collaboration within a sales team.
Craft a collaborative communication strategy for a sales team.

competency: Use lead generation automation technology to qualify the leads

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Identify the key features of lead generation automation technology.
Explain how automation improves the qualification process of leads.
Use a lead generation tool to qualify a list of potential leads.
Assess the quality of qualified leads generated through automation.
Evaluate the effectiveness of different lead generation methods.
Develop a new strategy for lead qualification using automation tools.

competency: Collate potential leads and prioritise these in accordance with sales targets

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: State the criteria for prioritizing leads according to sales targets.
Interpret sales targets and their implications for lead prioritization.
Prioritize a given list of leads based on specified sales targets.
Analyze the given sales data to identify high-priority leads.
Review the effectiveness of a lead prioritization strategy.
Design a lead prioritization framework based on sales objectives.

competency: Summarise information appropriately from sales systems for reporting to management

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Recall the main components required in a sales report.
Discuss the importance of clear reporting to management.
Generate a report from sales data using a provided template.
Break down sales data to identify key insights for reports.
Assess the clarity and effectiveness of a sales report.
Develop a comprehensive reporting template for sales data.

competency: Follow up incoming leads and assign the ownership of quality leads to the most relevant members of the sales team

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: List the steps involved in lead follow-up processes.
Explain the rationale behind assigning leads to specific team members.
Execute a follow-up process for incoming leads using a CRM system.
Differentiate between high-quality and low-quality leads and their implications for ownership assignment.
Examine a case where lead follow-up and assignment affected sales outcomes.
Formulate a policy for lead assignment and follow-up in a sales team.

competency: Monitor, process or delegate daily tasks within assigned ownership and visibility on technology systems

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Identify daily tasks typically monitored within a sales team.
Explain the role of visibility in task delegation.
Demonstrate monitoring daily tasks in a given sales technology system.
Evaluate the effectiveness of current monitoring practices for task management.
Assess how effective delegation impacts team productivity.
Design a task monitoring and delegation strategy for sales activities.

competency: Monitor own use of the sales technology system, seeking guidance, support and skills development where necessary

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Recall the importance of self-monitoring in technology system usage.
Identify how seeking guidance contributes to skill development.
Reflect on personal experiences to identify areas for improvement in using sales technology.
Assess the effectiveness of personal monitoring strategies in using the sales technology system.
Critique personal usage of sales technology systems based on performance outcomes.
Develop a personal development plan for improving skills in using sales technology.

competency: Provide feedback on the sales technology systems, your pipeline management and other tasks and activities

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: List the types of feedback typically provided on sales systems.
Explain the role of feedback in improving sales technology systems.
Provide constructive feedback based on a scenario involving the sales system.
Examine the feedback mechanisms in place for sales technology systems.
Assess the impact of feedback on the improvement of sales processes.
Propose a feedback system for enhancing sales technology effectiveness.

competency: Seek evidence-based recommendations for improvement of sales activities and personal productivity using the technology systems

blooms_taxonomy_criteria.criteria: Recall a method for gathering evidence-based data.
Describe how recommendations can enhance sales processes.
Use data to formulate recommendations for improving sales activities.
Identify trends in sales data that can suggest areas for improvement.
Assess the feasibility of implementing a given recommendation for improvement.
Develop an innovative approach for enhancing personal productivity using technology.
